Text: Sorry, just assumed that all users of tpb would know what this is and does.   Did not allow for the ignorance/arrogance of my American counterparts. Thanks, DeathsBane.   My comment was aimed at that particular person.   Did not intend to disrespect all of my American friends for whom I have great regards.  But there's always one asshole.   And now we all know who that asshole is.   Glad you are enjoying the up.   Regards.

Sorry, bytehog, that you don't like this.   There are some that do.   But I have to agree with you that CloneDVD2 is excellent.   Only snag is that there are some out there that find CloneDVD2 difficult to use.   And good observation, everyone should have a copy of AnyDVD.   Regards.
Thank you.   I read a great comment from someone earlier: "New does not always mean better".   Cheers, db_autotek.   Regards.
